title: LARGE UPDATED 4bed 2bath in Savin Hill! Cute Street! WALK TO JFK/UMASS
posting_body: ['PROPERTY DETAILS', 'Rent:', '$3800', 'Available:', 'September 1st, 2022', 'Beds:', '4', 'Bath(s):', '2', 'Pets:', 'Cats negotiable', 'Location:', 'Savin Hill Boston, Dorchester', 'Property Description', '*Multiple units available in building*', "Spacious updated 4 bed 2 bath in Dorchester's desirable Savin Hill neighborhood a short walk (approx. 8 minutes) to JFK/UMASS T Stop on UBER desirable Red Line!", 'A stones throw to local shops, restaurants, and bars.', ' Large bedrooms with renovated baths and sensible layout for roommates.', 'Gas heat, hardwood throughout, and cats negotiable.', 'Call me today with questions or to schedule a showing.', 'If this ad is up, its available!', '****10% OFF BROKER FEES****', "****I'm offering 10% off broker fees through August on this apartment or ANY other unit I have access too.", "Not what you're looking of?", "I've got over 10,000 rentals in Massachusetts.", "Give me a call I'm sure we can find you the perfect place!", '*', '***', "Ben Barrett | Boston's Finest Realty Group | Tel: (508) 317-9850", 'Search our website with over 10,000 rentals!', '<URL>', 'Massachusetts regulation 254, CMR 7.00 Disclaimer:', 'The information contained herein has been obtained through sources deemed reliable but cannot be guaranteed as to its accuracy.', 'While this information is believed to be correct, it is represented subject to errors, omissions, changes or withdrawal without notice.', 'Any information of special interest should be obtained through independent verification.', 'Photos may not always be of the advertised apartment; sample images may be used to make a general representation.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice.', 'The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rental.', "© Copyright 2022 Boston's Finest Realty Group, LLC.", 'All Rights Reserved.']
